name: Peanut Butter Cupcakes
author: 93CAMILLA39
summary: My baby sitter used to make these for us, we gobbled them down within 5 minutes!!!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a cupcake pan with paper liners, or grease and flour cups
In a large bowl, mix together the brown sugar, shortening and peanut butter until light and fluffy
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla
Combine the flour, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt; stir into the batter alternately with the milk
Spoon into the prepared muffin cups
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until the top of the cupcakes spring back when lightly pressed
Cool in the pan for at least 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely
